name: Bitmates Info - Wiki
description: Wiki to help the community of the game called Bitmates, built with React, CSS on the frontend and Node.js and express on the backend, thus creating an API based on data from another API.

name: Pixels - Land Tracker
description: Tool to track lands of the WEB3 game Pixels Online. Built with HTML, CSS and JavaScript (Vanilla). It helps players to be able to consult or do random roll between the 5000 lands of the game.

name: Pixels Missions
description: Pixels Online website provides users with information about missions and the reputation that each one grants, and if they are missions that request items, a box with the required items will be displayed in the list.
